mapper.select: SELECT B_ID, B_SUBJECT, B_WRITE_DATE, B_UPDATE_DATE, B_WRITER, B_VIEWS FROM bbs_board ORDER BY B_ID DESC

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, A.B_ID, A.B_SUBJECT, A.B_WRITE_DATE, A.B_WRITER, A.B_VIEWS FROM( SELECT B_ID, B_SUBJECT, B_WRITE_DATE, B_WRITER, B_VIEWS FROM bbs_board ORDER BY B_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}) B WHERE b.rnum >= #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs_board( B_ID, B_SUBJECT, B_CONTENT, B_WRITER )VALUES( seq_bbs_board.nextval, #{b_subject}, #{b_content}, #{b_writer} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bbs_board SET b_update_date = sysdate, b_subject = #{b_subject}, b_content = #{b_content} WHERE b_id = #{b_id}
